profile.name: Ganesh
profile.aboutMe: I think of myself as a thinker, doer and an achiever. I am an early morning riser. I believe in the saying 'all work and no play makes Jack a dull boy'. I believe in having to balance tradition and modernity to achieve the best in life.

projects.name: SongDownload
projects.description: This is a small script to get the names of songs and then download those songs from youtube using youtube-to-mp3

projects.name: Time table tracker
projects.techStack: HTML, CSS, bootstrap, JS for frontend. PHP and MySQL for backend.
projects.description: When the timetable of all the classes are provided, the time table of indivdual teachers is given out. The time tables are read in Excel documents. The time tables of inidivual teachers are also provided as Excel documents. This was used by our college to automate the routine process.

projects.name: Code For Good 2014
projects.description: This was developed as a team effort for the hackathon conducted by JP Morgan. After a rigourous selection procedure, an on spot idea was provided. An app was developed for an NGO named Akshaya Patra to provide nutritious meals throughout the week by considering the inventory.

projects.name: SpecialChat
projects.description: Developed as a part of team for the GDG Bangalore Hackathon. Won the third prise among close to 25 teams.

projects.name: Self Website
projects.techStack: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Material Design for frontend. Static NodeJS file as a mock of backend.
projects.description: Consists of all the entire code needed to bring up the website you are currently viewing.

hobbies.name: Tech enthusiast
hobbies.description: I am interested in learning new technologies and keeeping myself updated. Be it the Graph API or material design. Machine learning or Angular 4. I am in!

hobbies.name: Fullstack developer
hobbies.description: I am a self taught learner. This has made me understand code better. I see myself as a creator of beautiful code which is effecient and and scalable.

hobbies.name: Runner
hobbies.description: I have run many 10K runs. I hope to complete my first marathon soon. Running is something that frees me off my worries. It has taught me to fight for my goals, to push myself and reach the destination. What started as a stressbuster has gifted me a wonderful change in my life.

hobbies.name: Yoga enthusiast
hobbies.description: I believe in having a sound mind and sound body to be happy in life. Yoga has also helped me as a stressbuster

hobbies.name: Vocalist
hobbies.description: I have won many accolades in school and college. I am also good at my vocals. Also a novice in playing the Mrudangam.
